TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AsyncOperation extends System.Object

summary.span: 追蹤非同步作業的存留期。

span.span: Tracks the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您實作類別，以根據[事件架構非同步模式概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)，您可能需要追蹤每個類別的執行個體上叫用的非同步作業的存留期。When you implement a class according to the [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md), you may need to track the lifetime of each asynchronous operation invoked on an instance of your class. 類別會提供追蹤和報告的非同步工作進度的方法。The class provides ways to track and report the progress of an asynchronous task. 下列清單識別使用方式物件：The following list identifies ways to use an object: - 若要回報進度和過渡期的結果給用戶端，呼叫從非同步的背景工作角色程式碼。To report progress and interim results to the client, call from your asynchronous worker code. - 若要表示的非同步工作已完成，或取消暫止的非同步工作，呼叫。To indicate that an asynchronous task has completed, or to cancel a pending asynchronous task, call . 您的類別應該會看到每項非同步工作，藉由呼叫物件每項工作的啟動時。Your class should get an object for each asynchronous task by calling when each task starts. 若要讓用戶端能夠區分不同的非同步工作，採用參數的唯一用戶端提供的權杖，這會成為屬性。To allow the client to distinguish separate asynchronous tasks, takes a parameter for a unique client-provided token, which becomes the property. 它可以再供用戶端程式碼來識別這個特定非同步工作進度或完成的事件引發。It can then be used by client code to identify the particular asynchronous task that is raising progress or completion events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using an object to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 如需完整的程式碼清單，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作支援事件架構非同步模式的元件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c1aa4d4-da87-4a03-b812-3d167b8c57cf)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Component That Supports the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c1aa4d4-da87-4a03-b812-3d167b8c57cf). 如需完整的程式碼的清單用戶端，請參閱 < [ 如何： 實作事件架構非同步模式的用戶端](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/how-to-implement-a-client-of-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md)。For a full code listing of a client form, see [How to: Implement a Client of the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/how-to-implement-a-client-of-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#3)]

span.para: 實作者必須確定和非同步引動過程，使類別程式庫提供者不需要顧慮與潛在的堆疊溢位當它們假設特定的應用程式的非同步行為剛好是同步的模型。如需有關如何實作非同步類別的詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 實作事件架構非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md)。

Implementers must ensure the and invocations are asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchronous behavior in a particular application model that happens to be synchronous. For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md).

summary.span: 結束非同步作業的存留期。

span.span: Ends the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法以結束非同步作業的存留期。Call the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 這個方法會呼叫特定的工作之後，呼叫其對應會引發例外狀況。After this method is called for a particular task, calls to its corresponding will raise an exception.

exception.span: 先前已針對此工作呼叫 。

span.span: has been called previously for this task.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Post (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg);
.method public hidebysig instance void Post(class System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg) cil managed
Public Sub Post (d As SendOrPostCallback, arg As Object)

param.name: d
param.span: 物件，包裝作業結束時要呼叫的委派。

span.span: A object that wraps the delegate to be called when the operation ends.

param.name: arg
param.span: 包含在 d 參數中的委派引數。

span.span: An argument for the delegate contained in the d parameter.

summary.span: 在適合應用程式模型的執行緒或內容上叫用委派。

span.span: Invokes a delegate on the thread or context appropriate for the application model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會叫用指定的委派`arg`參數，而不需要結束非同步作業的存留期。The method invokes the delegate specified by the `arg` parameter without ending the lifetime of the asynchronous operation. 您可以呼叫方法時呼叫尚未結束非同步作業的存留期通常。You can call the method as often as you like while the lifetime of the asynchronous operation has not been ended by a call to . 您可以使用此方法進行或暫時結果回報給用戶端。You can use the method to report progress or interim results back to clients. `d`參數會包裝您想要在您想要張貼有關非同步工作的狀態更新時所呼叫的委派。The `d` parameter wraps the delegate you want called when you want to post an update about the status of the asynchronous task. 物件可確保您的委派叫用的執行緒或內容適用於應用程式模型上。The object will ensure that your delegate is invoked on the thread or context appropriate for the application model. 您的方法可以選擇性地引發事件，以便通知的狀態變更、 進行更新或新的、 可用的累加結果的用戶端。Your method can optionally raise an event that notifies clients of a status change, progress update, or newly available incremental results. `arg`參數應該用來將狀態傳遞至委派包裝`d`參數。The `arg` parameter should be used to pass state to the delegate wrapped by the `d` parameter. 它可能是參考，或可能是物件。It might be a reference to an , or it might be a object. 它可能會想要衍生您自己的類別，從提供額外的狀態存放區。It may be desirable to derive your own class from to provide additional state storage. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用報告進度和累加結果的非同步作業的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method for reporting progress and incremental results of an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#5)]

exception.span: 先前已針對此工作呼叫 方法。

span.span: The method has been called previously for this task.

span.para:
繼承者必須進行引動過程的非同步作業，使類別程式庫提供者不需要顧慮潛在的堆疊溢位，如果它們假設非同步功能，但剛好是同步的特定應用程式模型。
主控台應用程式不會同步執行呼叫。這可能會造成 事件不按順序引發。如果您想要以序列化方式執行 呼叫，請實作及安裝 類別。 如需有關如何實作非同步類別的詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 實作事件架構非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md)。

Inheritors must make the invocation asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchrony but a particular application model happens to be synchronous.
Console applications do not synchronize the execution of calls. This can cause events to be raised out of order. If you wish to have serialized execution of calls, implement and install a class. For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void PostOperationCompleted (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg);
.method public hidebysig instance void PostOperationCompleted(class System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object arg) cil managed
Public Sub PostOperationCompleted (d As SendOrPostCallback, arg As Object)

param.name: d
param.span: 物件，包裝作業結束時要呼叫的委派。

span.span: A object that wraps the delegate to be called when the operation ends.

param.name: arg
param.span: 包含在 d 參數中的委派引數。

span.span: An argument for the delegate contained in the d parameter.

summary.span: 結束非同步作業的存留期。

span.span: Ends the lifetime of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法以結束非同步作業的存留期。Call the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 這個方法會呼叫特定的工作之後，呼叫其對應物件將會引發例外狀況。After this method is called for a particular task, calls to its corresponding object will raise an exception. `d`參數會包裝您想要您的類別，因為完成、 取消或失敗之工作的工作的存留期結束時要呼叫的委派。The `d` parameter wraps the delegate you want your class to call when the task's lifetime ends due to completion, cancellation, or failure of the task. 物件可確保您的委派叫用的執行緒或內容適用於應用程式模型上。The object will ensure that your delegate is invoked on the thread or context appropriate for the application model. 您的委派可以選擇性地引發事件，以便通知非同步工作的存留期已結束的用戶端。Your delegate can optionally raise an event that notifies clients that the asynchronous task's lifetime has ended. `arg`參數用來將狀態資訊傳遞至完成委派`d`。The `arg` parameter is used to pass state information to the completion delegate `d`. 您可以使用物件，或有物件當做參數值。You can use an object, or an object as the parameter value. 或者，如果您想要提供額外的狀態存放區，您可以使用衍生自類別的執行個體類別。Alternatively, if you want to provide additional state storage, you can use an instance of a class you derive from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法以結束非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using the method to end the lifetime of an asynchronous operation. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#4)]

exception.span: 先前已針對此工作呼叫 。

span.span: has been called previously for this task.

span.para: 繼承者必須進行引動過程的非同步作業，使類別程式庫提供者不需要顧慮潛在的堆疊溢位，如果它們假設非同步功能，但剛好是同步的特定應用程式模型。這個方法應該解譯為 「 結束存留期 」 的呼叫，這表示實作需要執行什麼是適用於應用程式模型。比方說，ASP.NET 會遞減其未處理的非同步作業的計數。這也應該將作業狀態，到其中的任何後續呼叫會失敗，因為它已經完成。如需有關如何實作非同步類別的詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 實作事件架構非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md)。

Inheritors must make the invocation asynchronous, so that class library providers do not need to concern themselves with potential stack overflows if they assume asynchrony but a particular application model happens to be synchronous. The method should be interpreted as an "ending the lifetime" call, meaning the implementation needs to do what is appropriate for the application model. For instance, ASP.NET will decrement its count of outstanding asynchronous operations. This also should put the operation into a state such that any subsequent calls into it will fail, since it has now completed. For more information about implementing asynchronous classes, see [Implementing the Event-based Asynchronous Pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/implementing-the-event-based-asynchronous-pattern.md).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定用來唯一識別非同步作業的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets an object used to uniquely identify an asynchronous operation.

value.span: 傳遞至非同步方法引動過程的狀態物件。

span.span: The state object passed to the asynchronous method invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的類別支援多個非同步方法或單一非同步方法的多個引動過程，用戶端需要一個方式來判斷哪一項非同步工作會引發事件。If your class supports multiple asynchronous methods or multiple invocations of a single asynchronous method, clients will need a way to determine which asynchronous task is raising events. 您`MethodNameAsync`方法應該採用類型參數的，做為工作識別碼。Your `MethodNameAsync` method should take a parameter of type that will act as a task ID. 當您呼叫時，您將使用此工作 ID ，特定的引動過程，非同步作業的方法，這會建立關聯用戶端的工作識別碼。You will use this task ID when you call the , method and this will associate the client's task ID with a particular invocation of your asynchronous operation. 識別碼會提供給您的實作，透過這項工作屬性。This task ID is made available to your implementation through the property. > [!CAUTION] > 用戶端程式碼必須非常小心提供唯一的值給屬性。Client code must be careful to provide a unique value for the property. 非唯一工作識別碼可能會導致您的實作不正確地報告進度和其他事件。Non-unique task IDs may cause your implementation to report progress and other events incorrectly. 您的程式碼應該檢查是否有非唯一工作識別碼，並引發偵測到。Your code should check for a non-unique task ID and raise an if one is detected. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來追蹤非同步作業的存留期。The following code example demonstrates using to track the lifetime of asynchronous operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/CS/primenumbercalculatormain.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager/VB/primenumbercalculatormain.vb#4)]
